languages.text: {n}Инцендия стискивает кулаки и впивается зубами в нижнюю губу — ее обуревают сомнения. Наконец, она мрачно произносит:{/n} "И капли яда достаточно, чтобы отравить водоем. И братья и сестры его уже испили оттуда сполна. Миссия святого Друза на Футфоле будет подвергнута децимации, а на оставшихся в живых будут наложены жестокие епитимьи — пусть искупают преступления своего культа муками. Что касается, Иеронимуса... виновен".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инцендия стискивает кулаки и впивается зубами в нижнюю губу — ее обуревают сомнения. Наконец, она мрачно произносит:{/n} "И капли яда достаточно, чтобы отравить водоем. И братья и сестры его уже испили оттуда сполна. Миссия святого Друза на Футфоле будет подвергнута децимации, а на оставшихся в живых будут наложены жестокие епитимьи — пусть искупают преступления своего культа муками. Что касается, Иеронимуса... виновен".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

Миссия святого Друза на Футфоле будет подвергнута децимации, а на оставшихся в живых будут наложены жестокие епитимьи — пусть искупают преступления своего культа муками. Что касается, Иеронимуса... виновен".

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅握紧了拳头，牙齿咬着下唇，疑虑重重。到了最后，她阴沉着脸，开了口。{/n}“一滴毒液就足以腐化整片湖泊，而他的兄弟姐妹们已经从这片湖泊里喝了很多水。圣德鲁苏斯教会在落脚港的布道所必须被铲平，所有活下来的人都要接受严厉的惩罚，让那些人用痛苦来赎罪吧。至于希罗尼穆斯……他有罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅握紧了拳头，牙齿咬着下唇，疑虑重重。到了最后，她阴沉着脸，开了口。{/n}“一滴毒液就足以腐化整片湖泊，而他的兄弟姐妹们已经从这片湖里喝了很多水。圣德鲁苏斯教会在落脚港的布道所必须被铲平，所有活下来的人都要接受严厉的惩罚，让那些人用痛苦来赎罪吧。至于希罗尼穆斯……他有罪。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは拳を握りしめ、下唇を噛みしめた。彼女は疑念にさいなまれている。最後に、彼女は語り始めた。{/n}「毒がたった一滴あれば、湖全体を汚染することが出来る。そして彼の兄弟姉妹は、その湖から狂ったように水を飲み続けていた。聖ドルススのフットフォール任務は壊滅した。生き残った者達には厳しい懺悔が課されるだろう。教団の罪を苦しみで償わせるのだ。そしてヒエロニムス自身だが…有罪だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは拳を握りしめ、下唇を噛みしめた。彼女は疑念にさいなまれている。最後に、彼女は語り始めた。{/n}「毒がたった一滴あれば、湖全体を汚染することが出来る。そして彼の兄弟姉妹は、その湖から狂ったように水を飲み続けていた。聖ドルススのフットフォール任務は壊滅した。生き残った者達には厳しい懺悔が課されるだろう。教団の罪を苦しみで償わせるのだ。そしてヒエロニムス自身だが…有罪だ」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia aprieta los puños y hunde los dientes en su labio inferior. La duda la atormenta. Finalmente, dice en voz baja:{/n} «Una sola gota de veneno basta para envenenar un lago. Y sus hermanos y hermanas han bebido copiosamente de ese lago. La misión de san Drusus en Paso será diezmada y se impondrán penitencias severas a los supervivientes. Que expíen los crímenes de su culto con sufrimiento. En cuanto a Hieronymus... es culpable».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia aprieta los puños y hunde los dientes en su labio inferior. La duda la atormenta. Finalmente, dice en voz baja:{/n} «Una sola gota de veneno basta para envenenar un lago. Y sus hermanos y hermanas han bebido copiosamente de ese lago. La misión de san Drusus en Paso será diezmada y se impondrán penitencias severas a los supervivientes. Que expíen los crímenes de su culto con sufrimiento. En cuanto a Hieronymus... es culpable».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia ballt die Fäuste und beißt sich fest auf die Unterlippe. Sie wird von Zweifeln geplagt. Schließlich sagt sie finster:{/n} "Ein einziger Tropfen Gift reicht aus, um einen ganzen See zu vergiften. Und seine Brüder und Schwestern haben reichlich aus diesem See getrunken. Die Mission des Heiligen Drusus auf Footfall wird dezimiert, die Überlebenden werden mit schweren Strafen belegt. Lasst sie durch Leid für die Verbrechen ihres Kults büßen. Und was Hieronymus angeht ... er ist schuldig."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia ballt die Fäuste und beißt sich fest auf die Unterlippe. Sie wird von Zweifeln geplagt. Schließlich sagt sie finster:{/n} "Ein einziger Tropfen Gift reicht aus, um einen See zu vergiften. Und seine Brüder und Schwestern haben reichlich aus diesem See getrunken. Die Mission des Heiligen Drusus auf Footfall wird dezimiert, die Überlebenden werden mit schweren Strafen belegt. Lasst sie durch Leid für die Verbrechen ihres Kults büßen. Und was Hieronymus angeht ... er ist schuldig."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Rongée par le doute, Incendia serre les poings et se mord la lèvre, puis déclare d'un ton sinistre :{/n} « Une seule goutte suffit à polluer un lac... et ses frères et sœurs se sont abondamment abreuvés de cette eau. La mission de Saint Drusus à Castel sera éradiquée et des châtiments sévères seront infligés aux survivants, pour qu'ils expient les crimes de leur culte par la souffrance. Quant à Hiéronymus... il est coupable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rongée par le doute, Incendia serre les poings et se mord la lèvre, puis déclare d'un ton sinistre :{/n} « Une seule goutte suffit à empoisonner un lac... et ses frères et ses sœurs se sont abondamment abreuvés de cette eau. La mission de Saint Drusus à Castel sera éradiquée et des châtiments sévères seront infligés aux survivants, pour qu'ils expient les crimes de leur culte par la souffrance. Quant à Hiéronymus... il est coupable. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, yumruklarını sıkıp dişlerini alt dudağına geçiriyor. İçindeki şüphe onu yiyip bitiriyor. Nihayetinde kasvetli bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bütün bir gölü kirletmek için tek bir damla zehir yeterlidir. Kardeşleri, o gölün suyundan kana kana içtiler. Binliman'daki Aziz Drusus misyonu yok edilecek ve hayatta kalanlar ağır şekilde cezalandırılacak. Tarikatın suçlarını acı çekerek telafi etsinler. Hieronymus'a gelirsek... O suçludur."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia clenches her fists and sinks her teeth into her lower lip. She is racked by doubt. Finally, she says darkly,{/n} "A single drop of poison is enough to pollute an entire lake. And his brothers and sisters have drunk copiously from that lake. The Saint Drusus mission on Footfall will be decimated, and severe penances will be imposed upon the survivors. Let them atone for their cult's crimes with suffering. As for Hieronymus... he is guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia yumruklarını sıkıyor ve dişlerini alt dudağına geçiriyor. İçindeki şüphe onu yiyip bitiriyor. Nihayetinde kasvetli bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Bütün bir gölü kirletmek için tek bir damla zehir bile yeterlidir. Ve kardeşleri, o gölden kana kana içtiler. Binliman'daki Aziz Drusus misyonu yok edilecek ve hayatta kalanlar ağır şekilde cezalandırılacak. Tarikatın suçlarını, acı çekerek telafi etsinler. Hieronymus'a gelirsek. O suçludur."
traits.speaker: Chorda
